content: I'm excited to start a journaling practice, and I think it'll be a great way to process my emotions and reflect on my experiences. I'll probably focus on writing about my thoughts, feelings, and experiences related to my mental health journey, including my anxiety, depression, and therapy sessions. I might also write about my goals, accomplishments, and challenges, as well as things I'm grateful for each day. Since I've been attending therapy sessions twice a week for the past three months, I think journaling will help me integrate what I've learned in therapy into my daily life.
